title: European Naturopathic Congress – Health Promotion in a Pandemic
text:
APRIL 1st
1. 10:00 🔵 Welcome and Opening / Bienvenida y Inauguración
2. 10:30 🇨🇦 Dr Iva Lloyd, Naturopathic Doctor. President World Naturopathic Federation WNF.
What Lies Ahead for the Naturopathic Profession.
3. 11:00 🇪🇸 Manuel Navarro, Naturopath. President OCN FENACO Spain, No.Colegiado FENACO® 60.
History of Naturopathy: The Naturopathic Criterion in the Scholastism. Regula Vitae.
4. 12:00 🇫🇷 Jerôme Poiraud, Naturopath, President OMNES France & Benjamin Dupuis, Naturopath, Director OMNES France
Education Opens the Door for Regulation.
5. 12:30 🇪🇸 Tina Hausser, HP, NatDipl. Vice President International Relations OCN FENACO Spain, No.Colegiado FENACO® 2563.
History and Legal Frame of Naturopathy in Spain.
6. 13:00 🇮🇹 Silvia Polesello, Naturopath. President Istituto NeMI Italy.
Naturopathic Education in Italy.
7. 13:30 🇮🇪 Marian Mulligan, Naturopath. President IINM and Sphenoid Ireland CLG.
Integrated Naturopathy in the Treatment of Violence.
14:00-16:00 Lunch Break
8. 16:00 🇵🇹 José Maria Amaral, Naturopath. OCN FENACO Delegate in Portugal. No.Colegiado FENACO® 3754.
Naturopathic Approach to Fertility.
9. 16:30 🇫🇷 Daniel Kieffer, Naturopath. Founder CENATHO & Aude Véret, Naturopath. Director CENATHO.
Naturopathic History, Research and Legal Frame in Europe.
10. 17:00 🇨🇭 Anne GIMALAC, MSc MBA, Head of Navi, Research in Integrative Health, Switzerland.
Building Naturopathic Research Capacities in Switzerland : Opportunities & Challenges
11. 17:30 🇵🇹 Ana Sofía Silva, Naturopath.
Naturopathic Tools Used in Mental Health.
12. 18:00 🇪🇸 Esperanza Molina, Naturopath. President Naturopathic council Melilla, OCN FENACO. No.Colegiado FENACO® 2767.
Naturopathic Research on Intestinal Permeability and Microbiota.
13. 18:30 🇸🇮 Erika Brajnik, Naturopath. President Slovenian Naturopathic Association.
Naturopathy in Slovenia.
14. 19:00 🇪🇸 Alfredo Abascal, Naturopath. CEO of OCN FENACO, No. Colegiado FENACO® 2724.
Naturopathic Approach for optimal excretory and circulatory function
15. 19:30 🇦🇱 Arben Gjoni, Naturopath, Albania
Naturopathic Approach to Autism
16. 20:00 🇵🇹 Márcia Muniz, Naturopath. (APORTH)
The importance of behavioral and mental flexibility for the Naturopath
APRIL 2nd
17. 10:00 🇲🇽 Oscar de la Fuente Meléndez, Naturopath. Lic. Universidad Autónoma de Tlaxcala. (Mexico)
Abordaje de PX con Diabetes Mellitus tipo II desde la perspectiva Naturopática
18. 10:30 🇦🇷 Julieta Noceti, Naturopath Argentina
The origin of Naturopathy in Hispanic America
19. 11:00 🇨🇱 Abed Burgos, Naturopath. ONG Naturópatas para Chile.
Naturopathic study of the interaction of drugs with food.
20. 11:30 🇪🇸 Noelia Conde, Naturopath. No. Colegiado FENACO® 3741. President Naturopathic Council Galicia
Naturopathic Approach to intestinal inflammations
21. 12:00 🇷🇺 Alexander Zimin, Naturopath. Russian Scientific Association of Clinical Naturopathy and Phytotherapy
Herbal Naturopathy as promising sources for de creation of new bioactive supplements
22. 12:30 🇸🇮 Magda Rogelja, Naturopath Slovenia
Herbal Remedies and Naturopathy
23. 13:00 🇪🇸 Elena Portillo, Naturopath, No.Colegiado FENACO® 3720
Naturopathic study in health problems in diagnostic labels of intestinal inflammation and multiple sclerosis
24. 13:30 🇬🇧 Roger Newman Turner, Naturopath
History of Naturopathy in UK
25. 14:00 🇭🇷 Petra Hranilović, Naturopath, Croatia
Naturopathy in Croatia
14:00-16:00 Lunch Break
26. 16:00 🇵🇹 Tania Mendes, Naturopath
Naturopathic reserarch on fascia in te role of anatomical integrity
27. 16:30 🇧🇯 Agbahoungba Fernand Nathan, Naturopath, Republic of Benin (Africa)
Treatment of rheumatism in Benin: Naturopatic approach
28. 17:00 🇪🇸 María José Sala, Naturopath, Vicepresidenta de Formación, Investigación y Didáctica.
Evidence-Based Reserach in Naturopathy
29. 17:30 🇪🇸 Rocío Martín, Naturopath, No.Colegiado FENACO® 3756
Ergasic Osteodance, dance to balance muscle chains
30. 18:00 🇺🇾 Elizabeth Constela, Naturopath of ANTHU, Uruguay
What is and what maguey offers us as a Naturopathic technique?
31. 18:30 🇪🇸 Florencia Sabio, Naturopath, vocal of Doula of OCN FENACO
The Doula as a Naturopathic tool
32. 19:00 🇬🇷 NiKolaos, greece Naturopath
33. 19:30 🇫🇷 OMNES France, Cecile Conn & Yamina Betend (VP OMNES) & Maite Diharce, Naturopaths
Update Research Committee, Solidarity and Social Committee, Delegations in OMNES
34. 20:00 🇻🇪 Alexis Adarfio, Naturopath ASOVENAT (Venezuela)
Naturopathy for the elderly is the law in Venezuela
35. 20:30 🌍 Panel Discussion
European Region: Embracing History and Research – How to Meet the Needs
